stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: C-Level Employee Receives Whaling Email Credential Harvesting Attempt
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 25 April 2014, a financial sector organization reported a whaling email attempt against an executive suite (C-level) employee. The victim received an email purporting to be from their IT department directing them to a click a link provided in the email. If the victim clicked the link, their browser was directed to a malicious URL containing HTML and PHP for credential harvesting.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The victim received an email purporting to be from their IT department directing them to click on a link. The link contained a malicious URL that after redirects led to a credential harvesting site. ---- BEGIN EMAIL HEADERS ---- EHLO exchange.acibadem.com.tr MAIL FROM: SIZE=16476 RCPT TO:<[REDACTED]> DATA Received: from EXCMBX02.acibadem.com.tr ([fe80::ac28:9652:e318:bc31]) by EXCCAS06.acibadem.com.tr ([fe80::1904:c48b:2371:7610%14]) with mapi id 14.02.0318.004; Wed, 23 Apr 2014 13:04:30 +0300 From: Elena Sakharova Subject: IT Helpdesk: Mailbox Warning! Thread-Topic: IT Helpdesk: Mailbox Warning! Thread-Index: Ac9e22qxaUBkp0bsSFq/34U1ii1fPg== Date: Wed, 23 Apr 2014 10:04:29 +0000 Message-ID: <90AC3316216D4547AB9A544364749265335843@EXCMBX02.acibadem.com.tr> Accept-Language: ru-RU, en-US Content-Language: ru-RU X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: x-originating-ip: [80.65.63.227] Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="_000_90AC3316216D4547AB9A544364749265335843EXCMBX02acibademc_" MIME-Version: 1.0 --_000_90AC3316216D4547AB9A544364749265335843EXCMBX02acibademc_ Content-Type: text/plain; charset="koi8-r" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable ---- END EMAIL HEADERS ---- ---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ---- Dear user, Your mailbox is almost full. Please click on the link below to verify your = location and enable us increase your Webmail storage space to 2GB. 85% 100% Increase Storage Your Webmail Account will be suspended within 48 hours, if verification is = not done. At 95% you won't be able to send any mail. Thank you for your cooperation. IT Helpdesk ---- END EMAIL BODY ---- ---- BEGIN HTML EMAIL BODY ---- --_000_90AC3316216D4547AB9A544364749265335843EXCMBX02acibademc_ Content-Type: text/html; charset="koi8-r" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

= Dear user,

= Your mailbox is almost = full. Please click on the link below to verify your location and enable us = increase your Webmail storage space to 2GB.

=

85%      =               100%
 

=

If the victim clicks on the link provided in the email, they are directed to the url www.studiomixx.com.br/ilwa/ for credential harvesting.
